harmonizRv3 3.2.6

Reference

All functions

data_dict_apply()

Apply a data dictionary to any dataset

data_dict_evaluate()

Generate a report as an Excel spreadsheet of a study-specific data dictionary

data_dict_expand()

Transform any columns in a data dictionary component to a new component

data_dict_extract()

Create a data dictionary in the Maelstrom Research format from a dataset

data_dict_filter()

Subset data dictionary using column values

data_dict_flatten()

Transform any component in a data dictionary in colum(s) in another component

data_dict_group_by()

Group listed data dictionaries using column names

data_dict_group_split()

Split grouped data dictionaries into a named list

data_dict_list_nest()

Regroup splited listed data dictionaries

data_dict_match_dataset()

Inner join between any data and data dict variables

data_dict_opalr_fix()

Transform any data dictionary object from opalr to Opal format

data_dict_pivot_longer()

Transform column(s) in a data dictionary component into their longer equivalent

data_dict_pivot_wider()

Transform column(s) in a data dictionary component into their wider equivalent

data_dict_ungroup()

Ungroup data dictionaries

data_extract()

Create an empty dataset from a data dictionary

dataschema_evaluate()

Generate a report as an Excel spreadsheet of a dataSchema

dataschema_extract()

Create a dataSchema in the Maelstrom Research format from a data processing element

dataset_evaluate()

Generate a report as an Excel spreadsheet of a study-specific dataset

dataset_summarize()

Generate a report as an Excel spreadsheet of a study-specific dataset

dataset_visualize()

Generate a web application (bookdown) report of list of study-specific datasets

dataset_zap_data_dict()

Remove value labels of a data frame, leaving its unlabelled columns.

harmo_process()

Generate harmonized dataset(s) and annotated data processing elements file

harmonizR_help()

Call the help center for full documentation

harmonized_study_evaluate()

Generate an Excel spreadsheet report of a harmonization project

harmonized_study_summarise()

Generate an Excel spreadsheet report of a harmonization project

harmonized_study_visualize()

Generate a web application (bookdown) report of a harmonization project

opal_files_pull()

Download files from an Opal environment

opal_files_push()

Upload files to an Opal environment

opal_mlstr_taxonomy_get()

Get the taxonomy as used by Maelstrom Research

opal_project_create()

Create a project in an Opal environment

opal_tables_pull()

Download tables from an Opal project as a study

opal_tables_push()

Upload datasets into an Opal environment as tables in an Opal project

opal_taxonomy_get()

Get the taxonomy as used by Opal

open_visual_report()

Open a visual report in a browser

show_harmo_error()

Generate summary of data processing elements to display in the console

study_create()

Create a study as a list of datasets

study_evaluate()

Generate an Excel spreadsheet report of a study-specific datasets list

study_summarize()

Generate an Excel spreadsheet report of a study-specific datasets list

valueType_adjust()

Replace the valueType from (or to) any data dictionary to (or from) dataset

valueType_guess()

Guess the first possible valueType of any object

valueType_list

Give list of authorized valueType values

valueType_of()

Give the valueType of any object

valueType_self_adjust()

Search and replace the valueType of any data dictionary or dataset

Contents
